chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: Let's solve maximum subarray, otherwise known as Kedane's algorithm.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: Given an array of numbers, we want to find the subarray that has the maximum sum.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: This one has 7 minus 3 plus 4 equals 8, and that is the maximum, so we'd want to return that sum.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: Now we'll initialize the max sum that we saw as negative infinity, and the current sum as 0.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: So we see a minus 2, and we see that that is a better sum than negative infinity,

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: and our current sum is now minus 2.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: That negative is just going to take away from any of our better sums.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: So before we move on here, we actually set this current sum to be 0.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: Now when we move over here, our current sum updates to 7, and our maximum sum updates as well.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: We move over again, and we get a minus 3.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: That will make our current sum 4, and that does not update our maximum.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: This sum actually is helping us.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: So now when we go to the last element, we get a current sum of 8,

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: and we get our proper maximum sum of 8.

chunks.title: Maximum_Subarray_-_Kadane_s_Algorithm_--_Leetcode_53_144P
chunks.text: This yields an optimal O of n and a constant space solution.
